• {{ product.title }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ShopService } from './shop.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-shop', templateUrl: './shop.component.html', styleUrls: ['./shop.component.scss'] }) export class ShopComponent implements OnInit { products: Product[] = []; constructor(private shopService: ShopService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.shopService.getProducts().subscribe({ next: response => this.products = response.data, error: error => console.log(error) }) } }
